channel.itunes:subtitle: Latest news updates from HindustanTimes.com for ANALYSIS. For more updates hop on to HindustanTimes.com.

item.title: BJP Shiv Sena have eye on CM post
item.description: The Sena will now make efforts to topple its ally the BJP in a battle within the alliance The partner winning more legislators will get the top job unless the two have already reached an agreement Insiders say the acrimony may not end soon
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sena will now make efforts to topple its ally the BJP in a battle within the alliance The partner winning more legislators will get the top job unless the two have already reached an agreement Insiders say the acrimony may not end soon
item.itunes:summary: The Sena will now make efforts to topple its ally the BJP in a battle within the alliance The partner winning more legislators will get the top job unless the two have already reached an agreement Insiders say the acrimony may not end soon

item.title: There is a method in the ISIS madness
item.description: A terror group thats too radical too ruthless for al Qaeda is certainly not one to be trifled with Theirs was a marriage of convenience that ended in divorce earlier this year
item.itunes:subtitle: A terror group thats too radical too ruthless for al Qaeda is certainly not one to be trifled with Theirs was a marriage of convenience that ended in divorce earlier this year
item.itunes:summary: A terror group thats too radical too ruthless for al Qaeda is certainly not one to be trifled with Theirs was a marriage of convenience that ended in divorce earlier this year

item.title: India makes an impression on Mars
item.description: A Sputnik moment will happen this morning when Indias firstever planetary probe the Mars Orbiter Mission is pushed by its main engine into an elliptical orbit around Mars
item.itunes:subtitle: A Sputnik moment will happen this morning when Indias firstever planetary probe the Mars Orbiter Mission is pushed by its main engine into an elliptical orbit around Mars
item.itunes:summary: A Sputnik moment will happen this morning when Indias firstever planetary probe the Mars Orbiter Mission is pushed by its main engine into an elliptical orbit around Mars

item.title: Mamata remember Delhi gangrape protests and beware of Jadavpur
item.description: When Trinamool Congress head Mamata Banerjee took over as West Bengals chief minister in 2012 the reigning theme was poriborton change But two years down the line Banerjee can hardly be called an agent of change
item.itunes:subtitle: When Trinamool Congress head Mamata Banerjee took over as West Bengals chief minister in 2012 the reigning theme was poriborton change But two years down the line Banerjee can hardly be called an agent of change

item.title: Step on the gas What India must do for the planet
item.description: Jairam Ramesh is right when he says that India should agree to phase out HFC a powerful greenhouse gas But he is wrong when he argues that the nonpatented substitutes for this chemical are inflammable and therefore not desirable
item.itunes:subtitle: Jairam Ramesh is right when he says that India should agree to phase out HFC a powerful greenhouse gas But he is wrong when he argues that the nonpatented substitutes for this chemical are inflammable and therefore not desirable
item.itunes:summary: Jairam Ramesh is right when he says that India should agree to phase out HFC a powerful greenhouse gas But he is wrong when he argues that the nonpatented substitutes for this chemical are inflammable and therefore not desirable

item.title: Xi Jinping visit High on expectations low on delivery
item.description: A Rightwing nationalist government in India and a Communist Party of China that relies on nationalism as a crutch for legitimacy at home were not expected to have it easy at the first formal summit of their leaders Jabin T Jacob writes
item.itunes:subtitle: A Rightwing nationalist government in India and a Communist Party of China that relies on nationalism as a crutch for legitimacy at home were not expected to have it easy at the first formal summit of their leaders Jabin T Jacob writes

item.title: Sexual violence in academia must not be ignored
item.description: Two incidents of molestation have been reported from university campuses in West Bengal in the last one month In the first case which happened in Visva Bharati University in Santiniketan a student was molested by her classmates The second one happened in Jadavpur University in Kolkata where a woman was sexually assaulted by 10 men In both cases the respective administrations took a lot of time to register the complaints
item.itunes:subtitle: Two incidents of molestation have been reported from university campuses in West Bengal in the last one month In the first case which happened in Visva Bharati University in Santiniketan a student was molested by her classmates The second one happened in

item.title: Uddhav wary of BJPs Maha ambitions
item.description: Uddhav Thackerays hardline stance has left the BJP baffled First the Sena chief offered them two seats less than what they contested in 2009 then on Sunday he sacrificed two more seats and asked the BJP to be satisfied with 119 seats
item.itunes:subtitle: Uddhav Thackerays hardline stance has left the BJP baffled First the Sena chief offered them two seats less than what they contested in 2009 then on Sunday he sacrificed two more seats and asked the BJP to be satisfied with 119 seats

item.title: Signs are clear Modi is taking down the NehruGandhi nameplate
item.description: The churning of icons will go on as long as the NDA is in power But what kind of new signage emerges is difficult to foresee but it is not going to be an ovation to the NehruGandhi family Abhijit Majumder writes
item.itunes:subtitle: The churning of icons will go on as long as the NDA is in power But what kind of new signage emerges is difficult to foresee but it is not going to be an ovation to the NehruGandhi family Abhijit Majumder writes

item.title: Is aggression a China ploy to keep India in check
item.description: An escalation of the border dispute may in reality reflect Beijings more deepseated concern about a restive generation of Tibetans growing up in India that their spiritual leader the Dalai Lama does not control
item.itunes:subtitle: An escalation of the border dispute may in reality reflect Beijings more deepseated concern about a restive generation of Tibetans growing up in India that their spiritual leader the Dalai Lama does not control
item.itunes:summary: An escalation of the border dispute may in reality reflect Beijings more deepseated concern about a restive generation of Tibetans growing up in India that their spiritual leader the Dalai Lama does not control

item.title: India China closer but still cautious as Xi visit ends
item.description: Policymakers are grappling with the implications of Xis visit While some are underwhelmed others point to the achievements But all agree that border troubles dampened the mood
item.itunes:subtitle: Policymakers are grappling with the implications of Xis visit While some are underwhelmed others point to the achievements But all agree that border troubles dampened the mood
item.itunes:summary: Policymakers are grappling with the implications of Xis visit While some are underwhelmed others point to the achievements But all agree that border troubles dampened the mood

item.title: Heres why Modis defence of Muslims is expediently wise
item.description: Narendra Modis endorsement of Indian Muslims might have come a trifle late But its significance or expedience cannot be downplayed in the light of internal security imperatives dovetailed to his economic agenda
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modis endorsement of Indian Muslims might have come a trifle late But its significance or expedience cannot be downplayed in the light of internal security imperatives dovetailed to his economic agenda

item.title: Tibetan confidence in India has increased but will Modi give in to China
item.description: As much as the Tibetans are dependent on India given that the Tibetan exile government is based herenbspit is also a fact that Tibet remains the missing link in the IndiaChina border dispute

item.title: Defensive India needs to take firmer stand against China
item.description: Indias fumbling responses to the increasing Chinese incursions do not bode well for its Himalayan security writes Brahma Chellaney
item.itunes:subtitle: Indias fumbling responses to the increasing Chinese incursions do not bode well for its Himalayan security writes Brahma Chellaney

item.title: The PM must walk the talk on FDI
item.description: If Modi is serious about attracting more investment to the knowledgeintensive industries such as the biopharmaceutical sector his government will need to tackle three obstacles intellectual property rights regulatory system healthcare
item.itunes:subtitle: If Modi is serious about attracting more investment to the knowledgeintensive industries such as the biopharmaceutical sector his government will need to tackle three obstacles intellectual property rights regulatory system healthcare
